alert.note: Alert for Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 5:25PM MDT until July 27 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Weld County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 615 PM MDT. * At 525 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles northeast of Nunn, or 23 miles northeast of Fort Collins, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Nunn around 530 PM MDT. Pierce around 545 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Purcell, Ault and Eaton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
